what research (or clinical trials) is being done for Paroxysmal Choreoathetosis ?,NINDS supports and conducts research on movement disorders such as paroxysmal choreoathetosis. Much of this research is aimed at finding ways to prevent and treat these disorders.,NINDS,Paroxysmal Choreoathetosis
